Scoot Hard DX is a fair use parody. My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic
is owned by Hasbro. This is not endorsed by them nor is meant to
replace any official product. It is also not intended for kids. It is
intended for mature audiences, suggested 18+ years of age.
Please support the official release.

column1: Drank out of the water cooler.
Red Access Card Required To Use This!
Green Access Card Required To Use This!
Blue Access Card Required To Use This!
Management Access Card Required To Use This!
Now you have a machine gun. Ho-Ho-Ho.
Left/Right Click or Use Arrow Keys To Cycle Screens, ESC to Escape

Scoot Hard DX can be configured using the menus.

Press Escape to bring up the menu. Press F1 to bring up this screen.

NEW GAME: starts a new game. Pick your difficulty and go.
GAME STATES: save your current game, or load a current one.
Previous saves don't work between versions of the game.
OPTIONS: configure and tweak Scoot Hard DX or GZDoom
HELP SCREEN: this help screen
CREDITS: the people who worked on the game.
EXIT TO SYSTEM: exit the game

You are Scootaloo. Your mission is to escape
the Cloudsdale Weather Corporation and take down
the baddies running it. It won't be easy though.

Reading this will give you hot tips(TM).

You can only carry one one missile weapon at a time.

Either use up your shots first, or swap it out by walking over
another weapon and pressing the use key (default is E) to swap
it out. The dropped weapon will contain the ammo as well. If you
pick up the same weapon you currently have, you will pick up
the ammo from it rather than swap it out.

Bullet Weapons:
Blaster - You start with this weapon. Never runs out of ammo.
Submachine Gun - Rapid fire goodness. Infinite ammo.

Missile Launcher

Primary Fire - Shoots a straight firing missile.
Secondary Fire - Shoots a grenade that can bounce around.

A basic rocket launcher.

Contains 10 shots.

FillySeeker

Primary Fire - Shoots a heat-seeking missile.
Secondary Fire - Shoots a cluster grenade.

A modified rocket launcher meant for crowd control.

Contains 8 shots.

Hailer

Primary Fire - Shoots a single freezing projectile.
Secondary Fire - Shoots a spread of freezing projectiles.

Enemies that can freeze will freeze solid.

Contains 40 shots.

Lightning Gun

Primary Fire - Shoots a volley of five lightning balls.
Secondary Fire - Shoots a projectile that destroys projectiles.

This weapon can overcharge certain enemies.

Contains 75 shots.

Rainbower

Primary Fire - Shoots a projectile that generates wave of rainbows.
Secondary Fire - Shoots a stream of rainbow projectiles.

This weapon can atomize most enemies.

Contains 50 shots.

Tornadozer

Primary Fire - Shoots a tornado that ricochets and does massive
damage on targets.
Secondary Fire - Shoots a tornado that homes in on targets.

This weapon tears most enemies apart.

Contains 6 shots.

Vending Machines cost 1 bit for an apple, 5 for a hot meal on
Easy. This is increased by 2x on Medium, and 3x on Hard and
Discourse. On Discourse coins are very rare, making using
vending machines less of an option. Whee for capitalism!
(Note: Sanya is not a Communist either so hush)

To use a vending machine, go up to one and press use. If
you don't have enough bits, or aren't hungry, it will tell you so.

Destroy up anything that moves and get to the exit.

Find secrets along the way. Check for pushwalls.
These can contain hidden caches of goods. Also always
check the vent ducts. Always.

On some levels it might be a bit more complex than that,
namely the Pegasus Device. It shouldn't be too hard to blow it
up unless you work for Polygon. Just look around the place for
ways to destroy it.

On some levels there might be a Boss enemy. This enemy is
tougher than a normal enemy and is necessary to beat the level
and progress. They have specific patterns you must master and
look out for.

Red, Green and Blue Keys are required to unlock areas of the
level. To unlock most exits, you must find a Management Key.
This also can be used to unlock the safety protocols on the
Pegasus Device.

Scootaloo can't fly, but she can glide. Jump and hold down the
jump key (default is spacebar) and move forward to glide around.
Some secrets require being able to master this. Try doing some
neat tricks.

Scootaloo can equip three armor types.

Basic Armor - Provides 25 points of all three armors.
Bulletproof Armor - Provides 50 points of bullet armor.
Fireproof Armor - Provides 50 points of fire armor.
Weatherproof Armor - Provides 50 points of weather armor.
Super Armor - Provides 100 points of all three armors.

Occasionally you might find hidden, or in plain sight,
mystical buckets of chicken labeled 'EFS'. These Eldritch
buckets of chicken grant you the ability to become
an invincible chicken for about half a minute.

Fire - Peck their brains out!
Alt Fire - channel all your power into a Clustercluck. This
reverts you back after.
Press use on some posters to get important tips.
Heat up applesauce with explosives to get more health.
Most exits are locked by a Management Access Card.
There are hazardous wires in some areas.
Some can be shut off with switches.
Use vending machines to get food in exchange for bits.
Spectra pools are hurtful to the touch.
Most weapons have an alt-fire. Check them out!
Hold down the jump button/key and move to glide around.
You can also look around while doing this.
Master the movement to overpower your enemies.
Scootaloo: I Gotta Get Outta Here!
Scootaloo: What have they done to you?
Scootaloo: Why are you locked in a bathroom?
Scootaloo: Aw, banged yourself up real bad, huh?
Scootaloo: Aw, who's that pretty lady?
Scootaloo: I Gotta Stop This! They're going to flood the dam!
Scootaloo: Water you waiting for, Atmosphere?!
Cancer Mouse: I want to I want to talk to you about something all the kids love. My Little Pony.
Scootaloo: Oh, that wasn't so bad!
Cancer Mouse: Now 4Chan found this radio show host called Ghost, and he claimed to never watch My Little Pony, but it’s obvious that he's seen season 2 because...
Scootaloo: Can we not do this, like, ever. I'm really busy, I gotta find my friends and bust outta here.
Cancer Mouse: oh, and I thought you were a melting pot of friendship!
Scootaloo: I don't have time for this! I'm done! Stick a fork in me! I'm DONE.
Scootaloo: We'll see about that you crazy bucker!
Scootaloo: Say hello to your wife for me!
Scootaloo: Time to put an end to this...
Scootaloo: Woah, what kind of deformed mess are YOU?
Ilse: I dunno, one that can fly?
Scootaloo: Maimbow, you killed my friends, and have disgraced Equestria. Your reign of terror ends here and now!
Scootaloo: Give it up for Scoots!
Surprise: I'm done playing nice! DROP THE FLOOR.

Dr. Atmosphere: Hello Scootaloo. It seems you're making a mess of this place. Oh, where are my manners. Let me introduce myself. I am Dr. Atmosphere, the head engineer of this facility. I'm also the husband of Surprise... you know, the business mare you slaughtered escaping the factory. I'm going to make you really regret coming out of your mother's wretched womb...
Dr. Atmosphere: I’M GONNA ENJOY THROWING YOU INTO THE PEGASUS DEVICE PUSSY FIRST. AND ENJOY SEEING YOUR HAM SLICES GET PULLED IN.

Dr. Atmosphere: I see that you've made quite the mess on your little crusade. It's no matter, all will be repaired in time. I really hope you know that there is no stopping the pegasus race. We'll continue on, without you that is.
Dr. Atmosphere: You inept mule! You're going to die soon. Where the others have failed, I won't! I will gut you myself.
Dr. Atmosphere: I'm going to ask you to leave.
Dr. Atmosphere: You're all going to die up here.
Dr. Atmosphere: You should know it wasn't my idea to unleash the enforcers on you. It was Maimbow's. However, I have something else in mind for you. [cackles]
Dr. Atmosphere: I'm not going to lie, I miss Surprise. You took her from me...
Dr. Atmosphere: [laughs maniacally] She's not dead, she can't be dead. I'll save her, I'll crush you, I'll crush you all, and I'll save her, and you won't leave the factory!

Maimbow: Oh goodie, It's the little bitch that's been such a pain in my implanted balls. I am Maimbow Undash... you probably have figured out that I'm not your big sister… In fact, you could say that I'm your worst nightmare. Once I've dealt with you, I'm going to make Aurora watch... doesn't that sound oh so delightful? [laughs]
Maimbow: You know, I never gave you the chance to say goodbye to Orion. I apologize for being so rude, you can have him, [laughs].
Maimbow: How does it feel to kill one of your best friends? I think he said “I love you” while you slaughtered him. I hope you're happy with yourself.
Maimbow: Turn back now Scootaloo. You have no idea who or what you're messing with. We will prevail! We will win!
Maimbow: No! STOP. Don't touch that!
Maimbow: You bitch! YOU RUINED EVERYTHING! I WILL KILL YOU WITH MY BARE HOOVES FOR THAT.

Maimbow: I SPENT YEARS PLANNING MY REVENGE… I SPENT YEARS PLOTTING WITH OTHER PEGASI JUST LIKE ME TO PUT AN END TO INCOMPETENT FUCKS LIKE YOU. AND WHAT? FOR NOTHING. NO, YOU CANNOT STOP ME, I AM A GOD, AND I WILL SMITE YOU IF IT'S THE LAST THING I DO.

Maimbow: You know… I'm not even mad… If I can kill you, all this will be worth it. All that matters is if you die and I can shame Rainbow Dash for what she did to me! She will see me for what I am, a god. [chuckles]
Maimbow: I see that you've made it to my lair. You know I have a little surprise for you. Consider it a gift, before your untimely demise [laughs].
Maimbow: Welcome, Scootaloo, to your surprise. We have a second device that is better than the first one. It's only a prototype, but I will finish it. But first… you must die!
Maimbow: YOU FOOL. YOU CANNOT DESTROY ME, I AM A GOD!
Maimbow: I don't care if it's not ready, I'm turning this thing on… and you're going in it and that other bitch too!
Go to GZDoom Options (Advanced) for more settings

Easy Mode. Fewest enemies, lowest aggression, less damage taken, and enemies have lower health. You'll probably want this skill Eri.
Medium Mode. A few more enemies, normal damage and health. Vending machines cost 2x more.
Hard Mode. Aggression is bumped up a bit. So is enemy health and enemy count. Vending machines cost 3x more.
Discourse Mode. Aggression is much higher, enemies are maxed out on health. Not only do vending machines cost 3x more, but coins are rarer now. Only the most epic of gamers will play on this skill.

Due to their importance in weather control
and other tasks, there's a certain bit of
nationalism and pride within the Pegasus
race, and thus within the Pegasi city of
Cloudsdale within Equestria. However,
something changed recently that made
that even more profound.

Pegasi across Equestria were
suddenly required to do fitness exams,
and if they failed, are incarcerated
at the Cloudsdale Weather Corporation.

Meet Scootaloo. She, her friend
Orion Solstice, and another pegasi by
the name of Aurora Dawn all failed
their exams. Scootaloo failed, despite
being trained by Rainbow Dash.

Scootaloo doesn't take this sitting down,
and causes a distraction and gets away.
A guard chases after her.

She wrestles with the guard in the
construction zone, before exerting
enough force to overpower him. The two
fall down a ventilation shaft thirty floors
to the surface - to the Cloudsdale
Weather Corporation's ground location.

Fortunately for Scootaloo, she
survived the fall. The guard was not so lucky.

She finds a two way CB radio, utility belt
and a hoof blaster on the dead guard.
Surely someone out there could help her.
However, she can't get a signal from here.

Arming herself with the blaster and
strapping the utility belt up, she sees a door
ahead. Her goal is simple - survive and rescue
Orion, and Aurora if she can. There's no telling
what unspeakable nightmares she'll encounter.

Scootaloo takes a breather after enduring
a heated battle with Surprise and her
platoon of Rocket Guards. She can hardly
believe it herself.

She spots the exit behind Surprise's mosh
pit.

She climbs a radio tower and signals for
help. She manages to get ahold of someone,
but it's going to take a while for reinforcements
to arrive. Scootaloo is on her own.

Eventually she finds a computer room.
One of the screens lights up.

"Well, hello Scootaloo."

The aqua green pony looked like a bastardized
version of Rainbow Dash. Scootaloo was
shocked and confused.

"Who are you?"

The rainbow maned pony didn't
acknowledge. "Surrender now,
Scootaloo."

"There's nowhere to go. This factory
will be your grave."

"I don't need to kill you yet... I can
kill one of your friends first. Doesn't
that sound fun?"

They let out a menacing laugh.

Scootaloo knew what she had to do.

She had to get them back for sure.

However, little did she know what
fears and horrors await her...

Dr. Atmosphere, the head engineer,
needed to act fast. Scootaloo was
approaching at a rapid clip. He asks
the rainbow-maned Pegasus for
advice.

They calmly contemplate for a
moment.

"Release the enforcers."

Dr. Atmosphere was reluctant at
first. "They're a wee bit unstable,
we need more time to test them."

The multicolored Pegasus was
not having it. "I don't care. Do it
now."

Dr. Atmosphere chuckles a bit
and gives the Pegasus an odd
amulet. "Okay then, but I'm
warning you...

The dictatorial Pegasus puts it on, and
lets out a scream of agonizing pain.

Scootaloo takes the teleporter back to
the main facility after killing the deranged
Dr. Atmosphere. She sees a television
screen. It's the head pony - the one that
looks like Rainbow Dash. They've got Orion
Solstice over the gaping maw of a machine.

"Scootaloo, you killed my top
engineer... you ruined me,
now I'll ruin you!"

Orion looks at the screen.
"Don't worry Scoots, I love
you! Kick flank! Goodbye."

Before she could say goodbye
back, Orion is dropped into the
device.

The machine spits out bright
components - mainly red. It's
pumped into a nightmarish
contraption.

"You see Scoots, that's what
you get for crossing me. If you
don't surrender, it's going to
be Aurora next!"

Scootaloo, trying not to cry
at the loss of her friend,
raises the CB radio and uses
it.

"Go buck yourself..."

At this point, Scootaloo has one
goal in mind....

They must die for what they did
to Orion. And that machine must
be destroyed before it causes
even more death.

You go through a teleporter. It
takes you not to another part
of the facility, but to Cloudsdale's
outer reaches...

Maimbow prepares to take on Scootaloo. In
his preoccupation, Aurora manages to slip
away and hide somewhere. Will Scootaloo
be able to save her, or will she meet a
terrible fate like Orion did?

Maimbow is armed to the teeth. And he
is not going to go down easily. It's do or die.

Scootaloo stands over the dying body
of Maimbow Undash. He drops the amulet,
as well as a rose colored contact lens. His
cutie mark wears off. It was painted over.

Scootaloo recognizes it. It was Lightning
Dust. She had disguised herself!

Scootaloo was in shock.

"Why, Lightning Dust?"

"Because your big sister ruined
me! What better way than to ruin her
legacy? I wanted her to suffer...

So I worked my way up the Cloudsdale
Weather Corporation and hatched a plan...
to get back at not just her... but you as well!"

Scootaloo took a step back. She couldn't
believe it.

"You did all this just to get back at us?
Ponies have died because of you!"

Maimbow started to falter. "I know... I let
hate overflow me... and for that, I have paid
the price."

Scootaloo stood in awe as Maimbow
laid in his own blood.

"See Scootaloo, I knew you wouldn't
pass those required exams... so I knew
you'd end up here. and I'd be able to
destroy you in that machine... and then
I could some day amass an army to take
down Rainbow Dash and tell her it was
all her fault!"

Maimbow chuckled. "I was such a
fool. I let my hate blind me."

Maimbow faltered more as he lost
more blood. "Forgive me... please...
whatever waits me beyond this,
I deserve and I am ready for."

Scootaloo contemplated for a moment.
She couldn't bear to think about all the pain
and misery Maimbow had brought her.
She lost two of her friends to this bastard.

She had her answer.

"You know what, you're right. I'll forgive
you..."

Maimbow was thrown into the second
barely functional Pegasus Device, head
first. The machine puked out every
color known to Pegasuskind. Scootaloo
knew what she had to do.

The Pegaus race was too sick to save.
It was disgraced by the actions of the
Cloudsdale Weather Corporation.

It must be purged.

She got control of the Enforcers using Maimbow's
amulet. She also got control of the Spectrawasps.

She swore to exterminate every last
pegasi in Equestria and beyond,
starting with the remaining forces of the
Cloudsdale Weather Corporation. Those who
chose to surrender were lobotomized, and
forced to serve in her burning crusade.

The loss of Orion and Aurora had pushed
Scootaloo to insanity.

Once she's done with the Pegasus race, who
knows what horrific crimes she'll continue to
commit against life itself.

Scootaloo is no more, her soul is but a fleeting
memory, and her body an empty husk of her
former self. All that remains is Absentia.

Here she will continue her war against life itself...
In the Rainbow Factory... where not a single
soul gets through.

Aurora, who had been quiet, spoke up.
"Maimbow, I forgive you. I believe love can conquer
all evils in this world... if I were to let hate
consume me, I'd be no better than you."

Scootaloo thought for a moment. She then
spoke up. "Aurora's right. I must end the
cycle of hate somewhere. However, rest
assured, I'm going to help ensure this
never happens anywhere again. Got it?"

Maimbow sheds a tear. "Rainbow did
good."

He gasps his last breath, before his life slowly
fades from his body.

Scootaloo sees the amulet that Maimbow
dropped. It has a weird symbol. It appears
to be what Maimbow used to control the
Enforcers. She breaks the amulet. She
hopes that frees them.

Scootaloo, with a renewed sense of
purpose, looks at her new friend. The
two had survived the Cloudsdale
Weather Corporation.

"I'm Scootaloo." She says to Aurora.

"I'm Aurora Dawn. Thanks for saving me."

Scootaloo and Aurora made a promise
that day to each other... they'd remember
Orion, and never forget what happened here.

However, they also found it in their hearts
to forgive and learn from this. Equestria
would recover.

1. Jenna Pepper 2. SanyaWaffles 3. EllieJojo 4. Kelsie Finefeather 5. RodScorpion 6. NeonBat
7. Marisa Kirisame 8. DRPReskins 9. Epic Acrylic 10. Earth
Not Pictured: Alabeanz, Redsoldier55, Jona_Arts, Metal Neon, AndromedaHawking
TEAM SCOOT HARD DX THANKS YOU FOR PLAYING!
